languages.text:
The first psychic power relayed through the Psyber-Raven incinerates the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} Fire damage to all enemies inside.
Deals 100% more damage to Xenos, Psyker, and Daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
The first psychic power relayed through the Psyber-Raven incinerates the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} Fire damage to all enemies inside.
Deals 100% more damage to Xenos, Psyker, and Daemon enemies.

languages.text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches the enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing them {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

languages.text:
Первая {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g}, {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} псайбервороном за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, обжигает врагов в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг этого фамильяра, нанося каждому из них {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.
Этот урон удваивается против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.
languages.original_text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches the enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing them {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Первая атака {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилой{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} кибервороном, выжигает врагов в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг фамильяра и наносит им {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}.
Этот урон удваивается в бою против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

Первая атака {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилой{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} кибервороном, выжигает врагов в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг фамильяра и наносит им {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}.
Этот урон удваивается в бою против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

Первая {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g}, {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} псайбервороном за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, обжигает врагов в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг этого фамильяра, нанося каждому из них {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}.
Этот урон удваивается против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンのを通じて{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}内に最初に{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}が{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}と、使い魔の周囲4セルの敵を焼き、{uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa}の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。
このダメージは、ゼノ、異能者、デーモンの敵に対して+100%増加する。
languages.original_text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンのを通じて{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}内に最初に{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}が{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}と、使い魔の周囲4セルの敵を焼き、{uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa}の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。
このダメージは、ゼノ、異能者、デーモンの敵に対して+100%増加する。

languages.text:
Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} par la psyber-corneille au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} consume les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour du familier et leur inflige {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}.
Ces dégâts sont augmentés de +100 % contre les xénos, les psykers et les démons adverses.
languages.original_text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} par la psyber-corneille au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} consume les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour du familier et leur inflige {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}.
Ces dégâts sont augmentés de +100 % contre les xénos, les psykers et les démons adverses.

languages.text:
El primer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmita{/g} mediante el psicocuervo quema a los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al familiar, infligiéndoles {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}.
Este daño aumenta un +100 % contra xenos, psíquicos y daemons.
languages.original_text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
El primer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmita{/g} mediante el psicocuervo quema a los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al familiar, infligiéndoles {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}.
Este daño aumenta un +100 % contra xenos, psíquicos y daemons.

languages.text:
当生化渡鸦每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，会灼烧距离4格内的所有敌人，造成{uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa}点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。
此效果对异形、灵能者、恶魔造成的伤害提高100%。
languages.original_text:
The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
当生化渡鸦每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，会灼烧距离4格内的所有敌人，造成{uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa}点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。
此效果对异形、灵能者、恶魔造成的伤害提高100%。

languages.text:
Die erste {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psionische Kraft{/g}, die in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} durch den Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umgeleitet{/g} wird, versengt Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Vertrauten und fügen ihnen {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} zu.
Dieser Schaden erhöht sich um +100 % gegen Xenos, Psioniker und Dämonen.

The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven scorches enemies in a 4-cell radius around the familiar, dealing {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to them.
That damage is increased by +100% against xenos, psykers, and daemon enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Die erste {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psionische Kraft{/g}, die in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} durch den Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umgeleitet{/g} wird, versengt Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Vertrauten und fügen ihnen {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} zu.
Dieser Schaden erhöht sich um +100 % gegen Xenos, Psioniker und Dämonen.

languages.text:
Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ruhsiber kuzgun aracılığıyla {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} ilk {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g}, iyenin etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanları yakıp kavurarak onlara {uip|FireDamage|6a40ad34e6fa4400a96b82ebd140fcaa} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir.
Bu hasar; zeno, ruhsezer ve iblis düşmanlara karşı +%100 artar.
